body:
I'm mk7. My main reason for coming here is thus:
I can come off as an asshole on these servers, and i honestly feel ashamed of myself. Whenever I say something that is, well not "mean', but unnecessary, I regret it within an hour. I just can't stop myself sometimes, mostly when its about how this server copies off others. 
Honestly, I am a person who is easily pissed off at things on this server, like lag, which I get a good dose of daily, and things that don't work out. I do not want to be a jerk, i really don't. And it may appear that way to some people. 

But anyway, I am a huge Mario Kart fan, I'm so excited about getting Mario Kart 8 this week.
body_tagged:

Honestly, I am a person who is easily pissed off at things on this server, like lag, which I get a good dose of daily, and things that don't work out. I do not want to be a jerk, i really don't. And it may appear that way to some people. 

But anyway, I am a huge Mario Kart fan, I'm so excited about getting Mario Kart 8 this week.

Ok, this sí the third time you've flamed a topic. I don't care if this post gets deleted, but it's about time you've been told this:

Stop bullying people. Just stop. Dont bother continuing to say things that are rude and utterly useless on other peoples threads. Show some respect for once kid. Why is that so hard? This isn't fucking 4chan. People have feelings. Think for a minute. This guy has been on other servers and has been pushed to his limit. He can't help it.
